Take your favorite character wherever you go!&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;\n\nYou are buying a license to access digital content per the &lt;span class=&quot;link&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;event:https://www.ea.com/legal/user-agreement&quot;&gt;EA User Agreement&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;.
The Sims™ 4 SpongeBob Kid's Room Kit
Decorate a bedroom with furniture inspired by the iconic cartoon with The Sims™ 4 SpongeBob Kid’s Room Kit.  If nautical nonsense be something you wish, you can fill the room with toys and cozy outfits that celebrate all things SpongeBob.\n\n&lt;font color=&quot;#1A81E1&quot;&gt;Kit Features:&lt;/font&gt;\n\n&lt;ul type=&quot;circle&quot;&gt;&lt;li&gt;A Cheerful Room – Plaster the walls with decals of your favorite characters, including SpongeBob and Patrick! There are toys, like a dollhouse replica of The Krusty Krab, plus pineapple furniture including a dresser and bookshelf ! It’s a collection that’ll make even the sourest squid smile.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Fandom Fashion – Display your love of SpongeBob with comfy clothes! There’s a t-shirt, pjs, and you’ll feel especially snuggly in slippers that look like SpongeBob, or his friends. To purchase a Styled Room, click it, select your preferred color palette, and click the Buy Room button.\n\nYou can then place it on your lot and move, resize, or edit it like any other room. You can also quickly buy the room as-is by double-clicking on the small thumbnail. To buy an individual object in the room, hover over it to select it and then click.

Look around the neighborhood for Sims in vibrantly themed regalia and ask them for a sugar skull.\n\nCompleting the sugar skull collection allows your own Sims to join in the festivities! This interaction rewards your household with a tenth golden skull and enhanced interactions with the Grim Reaper.

Mega Window (Double Budget Grand Deluxe DeLite)
We produced this window by combining the plans for all of our other Mega Windows. It’s pretty good quality, a great size, decently attractive… It’s not necessarily everything you want but it’s certainly none of the things that you don’t want! Buy dozens!
Mega Window (Reverse Shutter)
Thanks to an error that flipped the blueprint image we scanned into the database of our assembly line robots, we have manufactured thousands of windows with the shutter attached to the wrong side. Use with our original shuttered Mega Window to create a nice symmetrical look.
Mega Window (Shutter)
We wanted a window that would practically scream “handmade antique.” That’s why we programmed our battery of assembly line robots to add a quaint wooden shutter to our popular Mega Window. You won’t believe the hands that made it were 40% tungsten!
The Craftsman
Simple yet decorative, these hand-carved wooden windows add beauty to any Craftsman home.
Mega Window
99.9% of our antique windows are mass produced on our assembly line; however, as a special promotion, we had an actual human artisan come in and hand carve 100 Mega Windows. We won’t tell you which ones are his, but if you buy enough to cover your house there’s a good chance you get at least one, right?
Mega Window (Cloverleaf)
This window is the result of a design challenge. We asked our assembly line robots to produce something that would let in as little light as possible but still be considered a “window” by human standards. Despite the rather subjective requirements of the test they did quite well!
Mega Window (Double Budget DeLite)
What’s that you say? Six panes of Glaz aren’t enough? You want even more of our proprietary glass substitute in your antique window? Well say no more. We had our assembly line robots stick two Mega Windows together using the finest wood glue on the market. Now you can show all the neighbors that you’re a twelve-paner!
Mega Window (Budget DeLite)
For the budget-conscious consumer with a taste for antiques, we offer the Budget DeLite version of our popular Mega Window. Carved from discarded holiday trees that we buy in bulk, each window features 6 panes of Glaz, our semi-transparent glass substitute.
Mega Window (Budget DeLuxe)
If you like your windows to be a piece of glass in a wooden frame, oh boy, have we got the window for you! This is the window that gets manufactured when we press the “Test” button after rebooting our assembly line robots.
Arch You Happy to See Me?
This dramatic architectural feature is both arresting and appreciated.
Mega Window (Grand Deluxe)
Robots have difficulty with the concept of human excess, but we were able to work around that by swapping their definitions for “efficient” and “inefficient.” Now our window-crafting bots have been able to manufacture our grandest window yet, the Mega Window Grand Deluxe!
Mega Window (Double Grand)
We asked the AI for our assembly line robots how it could construct a window that was twice as good as the Grand Mega Window, and it produced this in reply. We’re still not sure if it was being sarcastic or not.
Mega Window (Grand)
It turns out that robots are incredibly good at breaking glass. When we realized our assembly line robots smashed 30% of the windows they constructed, we found a simple solution: program them to feel deep shame whenever they break a window. Now we get beauties like this Grand Mega Window without so much as a chip in the glass!
Mega Window (Double Deluxe)
At MegaMission Outdoor Warehouse, every one of our antique windows and doors is made by hand by assembly line robots. Now, thanks to a slight error in a recursive function in their deluxe window-crafting program, we have produced thousands of high quality double windows. Some of the greatest inventions were born from simple errors!
Old Meets View
Add an air of old world charm with an eye-catching, mission-style arched window.
Mega Window (Deluxe)
People always ask us how we are able to make such a narrow window at such high quality. The answer is simple! When we program our assembly line robots to make windows, we set both “narrow” and “high quality” to true!

Moon Panda Toy
&lt;i&gt;This toy was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019.&lt;/i&gt;\n\nAs the animals celebrated the New Lunar Year within the grand hall, the Panda sat alone outside. He did not receive an invitation, and thought it disrespectful of him to join the party.\n\nHe soon left and wandered to the riverside. Among the bamboo reeds along the water's edge, he sighed so loudly, a river spirit heard his cry. “Why so forlorn?” the spirit asked. At the end of the Panda's tale, the spirit told the Panda, “I will not allow you to be forgotten…”  Moonlight bathed the Panda, and the surrounding bamboo reeds sprouted buds in the shape of little pandas.\n\nLater, children plucked the panda-shaped bamboo, painted them with favorite colors at home, and shared them with other children. Somewhere else, the Panda smiled, and continued chewing a bamboo stalk.

Wallu Woven Basket
Bring beauty into your home with a rich piece of West African heritage: a Wolof basket! Traditionally crafted by the Wolof people in Senegal, these baskets are known for their blends of colors and intricate patterns. Made with classic weaving techniques using natural materials and recycled plastic, they offer a meaningful way to support artisans and environmentally friendly practices. Enjoy the &quot;Wallu&quot; style—a timeless silhouette with varieties that fit seamlessly into any home.

Thank You, Wardrobe
&lt;font color= '#199C2C'&gt;Designed By: peacemaker_ic&lt;/font&gt;\n\nThanks to all the wardrobes out there who help Sims get dressed every day for the past 21 years...and thanks to those who choose their outfits with care. Thanks to those who dress in a rush and accidentally leave the house wearing bunny slippers. And special thanks to those cold, awkward blurry moments where there are no clothes, because in those times we appreciate wardrobes most of all.
Trendsetter's Dresser
This dresser is flawless. I heard that Diego Lobo has a dresser like this, and he filled it with clothes, so I got a dresser like this, and I filled it with clothes.
Cozy Cubby
This cubby allows for a little flair by pairing boxes with icons for easy toddler use. Some cubbies even have their own splash of color to make this an instant win for any child.
Zes Horizontal Dresser
Your clothing will keep a low profile in this preternaturally understated six-drawer dresser.
Unmentionables Dresser
Princess Cordelia enjoyed structured clothing. Often sporting a bustle and a corset, undergarments were everything to her! She needed a lot of space to store her unmentionables so she designed this bottomless dresser that allowed her to change outfits at will. Amazing!
Ysabel Horizontal Dresser
True Mission-style design isn't just about hardwood grain, metal pulls, and geometric lines. It's also about dovetails, cornices, mortise, and tenons. If you know what any of this means, then you want this dresser.
Thumbkin Child's Dresser
Child-sized four-drawer dresser doubles as a bench, desk, or changing table. Sturdy enough to withstand repeated &quot;monkey on the bed&quot; games.
The Architrave
Subtly evoking Inquisition-era furnishings, Reclamation Homeware's six-drawer dresser is girdled in cold steel, like a horizontal Iron Maiden or a mad scientist's apothecary chest.
Weathered Wonder Dresser
Nothing says romance like a few bumps, bruises and mysterious scars. And nothing shelters your clothes with such stoic elegance as the Weathered Wonder. Standing tall, with long graceful lines and four proud, battered drawers, this triumphant antique is the stuff of true fantasy.
Enigma Dresser
With the Enigma dresser, as with so many things, it’s what’s beneath the surface that counts. Hiding below its unassuming top is a treasure trove of hidden curves and secrets. Intricate designs and fine details dare you to explore its depths fully.
Audrinite Dresser
Cutting-edge polymers protect your clothes from moths, eavesdropping by government intelligence, and ever going out of fashion.
The Neo
Your dresser holds clothing which can be rearranged into an amazing array of styles and outfits. Like the human heart, the dresser is the container of all of the different permutations of YOU. It deserves the consideration and attention you’d put into choosing your own casket. Might we at Reclamation Homeware humbly suggest… The Neo?

Bring a piece of happiness to your child's bedroom today with this whimsical low dresser. Kid tested, child approved.

TOBOR

Poppy

Morcubus
Beyond time and space is a world of black fire. From the heart of this maelstrom of horrors was born the infernal Morcubus!! As president and CEO of MorcuCorp he advances his dark designs, and he also leads team-building workshops.
Lyndsay
With an insatiable thirst for adventure, Lyndsay always keeps one eye on the horizon. Her contagious energy often sees her friends swept up in her latest quest. May have had a thing for Buddy at some point??
Leaf
Leaf is a hardcore elvish rock star and he totally knows it. What many people don’t know is that he still carries a small piece of his baby blanket, which he calls “Blanky,” everywhere he goes. Blanky is Leaf’s oldest and truest friend.
Jenny
Jenny was a fan fiction pioneer! Sure, nowadays EVERYBODY gets a publishing deal or a movie based on their self-published stories, but Jenny’s “Starcruiser X” fanfic was the first!
Hopper

Goth Boy

Gonk
Gonk is a happy and hungry little cave-lad from the Uncharted Isle, which strangely can be found on most maps. His best friends are Bobaboo the dinosaur and a dissatisfied grad student named Sylvia, whom he calls “Girl.”
Chef Gino
Gino’s skills in a kitchen are matched only by his sense of melodrama. The tiniest thing goes wrong and he’s “ruined.” To date, Gino has been ruined 9,685 times.
Ol' Gabby
Gabby’s a cantankerous old grump who lives with his junkyard dog, Grit. He enjoys tinkering with things and getting into feuds with his longtime frenemy Barney. (Sorry there’s no Barney figurine.)
Elmira Clamp
Elmira is sour, strict, impatient, and fussy. Her favorite sound is absolute silence and her favorite hobby is toil. On the plus side, um… she’s pretty good at remembering names? That’s something, right?
Dr. F
Dr. F is the indomitable mad scientist with PhDs in robotology AND robotonomy. There are many, many conflicting reports as to what the “F” actually stands for. He invented TOBOR.
Chaz McFreely
Chaz McFreely is the world’s greatest extreme sports athlete, according to Chaz McFreely. In his mind there are only two kinds of people: Chaz Fans and Chumps. Which are you?
Zombie Carl
Poor Carl. Things have only gotten worse for him since he died. He spends a lot of his time wondering what he’s actually accomplished and basically having an afterlife-crisis.
DJ Candy
DJ Candy is like a living, breathing dance party that never stops. With her roadies and #1 fans, Zach and Sapphire, she travels the world bringing the party to those who need it most.
Buddy
There is no better sidekick than your ol’ pal, Buddy. Supportive, optimistic, and fiercely loyal, he’ll stick by your side through any adventure. Last seen moonlighting as a special agent.

&lt;font color= '#199C2C'&gt;From the Blast from the Past Event&lt;/font&gt;\n\nMISSING?! What do you mean Bella is missing? Isn't she here? In her red dress? ...Where did this carton even come from? Is this a warning?
Socialite
Socialite is a precious metal that is highly sought after to make attractive and extremely valuable jewelry. 
Pyrite
Pyrite has a metallic sheen and brassy-yellow color, but you’d have to be a fool to mistake this for real gold!
Punium
Punium is a metal just like any other, but it is habitually overlooked and no one takes it seriously. Perhaps because of its name?
Phozonite
Phozonite is a yellow-tinted metal that has good electrical and thermal conductivity, but is famous for its unique atom arrangements.
Obtainium
Obtainium is pale white in color and is also one of the most abundant metals so it is relatively easy to obtain.
Literalite
Literalite is a hard-to-find purple metal that little is known about, and currently its properties are taken at face value.
Flamingonium
Flamingonium is a startling shade of pink and is the go-to metal for creating shiny lawn ornaments.
Death Metal
Death Metal is remarkably resistant to corrosion and is speculated to be the material used in the Grim Reaper’s scythe.
Baconite
Baconite is a soft, red colored metal that oddly has a faint smell of juicy, delicious cured pork.
Alcron
Alcron is a highly abundant silvery, ductile metal which means it doesn’t crack or break under stress as easily!
Utranium
Utranium is a metal with a low melting point that was once used as a pigment to dye almost everything purple!
Simtanium
Simtanium has a shiny, reflective green appearance and is highly conductive so it is used in the production of computer parts like circuit boards.
Sadnum
Sadnum is a soft, malleable metal that is typically found in a blue state and is as rare as a unicorn’s tear. 
Romantium
Romantium is a blush-colored metal that is highly reactive chemically; you might even consider it one of the most amorous metals.
Plathinum
Plathinum is a common transition metal that has a variety of uses since it doesn’t react to most chemicals.
Ozinold
Ozinold is a dense, heavy metal accidentally discovered by Harold Ozinold and subsequently named after him due to their similar characteristics.
Ironyum
Ironyum is a metal not many understand as it often reacts in the opposite manner of what you would expect.
Heavy Metal
Heavy Metal like brass is the metal of choice for musical instruments because of its malleability and acoustic properties.
Furium
Furium is highly reactive and flammable compared to other metals. It is prone to outbursts and tarnishes easily.
Crytunium
Crytunium is highly brittle; making it frustratingly hard to work with as it breaks apart easily and is not commonly found.

“Bestseller”, that’s all the client kept repeating as {0.SimFirstName} finished their last meeting before the deadline. Nearly every publishing company was chomping at the bits to be the novel’s sole printer.  The client even wrote the entire foreword of the book thanking {0.SimPronounObjective} and noting their contributions to the tale. {0.SimFirstName} wasn’t at all shocked when {F0.she}{M0.he} saw the clients payment for {F0.her}{M0.his} work was much higher than the original agreed amount.
With the client still stuck on a few details of the world and publisher interest waning on the incomplete story, the client scrapped the idea believing they wouldn’t be able to finish the novel. Though {0.SimFirstName} got paid for the work {M0.he}{F0.she} provided, {F0.she}{M0.he} felt like they could have done more to help solidify the idea in the clients head and make something groundbreaking.

Mega Fence (Basic)

Mega Fence (Deluxe)
Due to a catastrophic error in the logic of our fence-crafting robot AI, our assembly line of robots suddenly forgot how to make straight lines and produced these intricate fences. While not strictly mission-style, they are pretty nice looking. We decided to call this our “Deluxe” model.

Build Mode
Styled Looks
There are looks for every occasion.  You can change the Outfit Category at the top and try on anything, click the Try this Style button to put on the outfit.\n&#xD;&#xA;Note:  Hair, Face, and Body shape won't change by applying any of the Styled Looks.
Click on the Styled Looks to begin browsing the preset outfits we've put together for you!  Use them as they are, or treat them like a starting point to create your own outfits.
There are multiple selections in each category. Click the arrows at the bottom to swap between the different looks!\n&#xD;&#xA;There are also several color options. Click on the different color swatches to browse the colors.
Relationships
Setting one relationship can have an effect on other relationships.  If a choice you made causes a previous relationship setting to become invalid, an alert will appear next to the relationship of the modified Sim.&#xD;&#xA;
In the Edit Relationships panel, you can set the relationships for each household member to the current Sim.\n&#xD;&#xA;Click on the drop down next to the Sim portrait to choose their relationship to that Sim.&#xD;&#xA;&#xD;&#xA;When you are done making edits, click the Checkmark to close the panel.
Once you have more than 1 Sim in your household, you can set your Sims' relationships to one another.  Who's whose parent?  Is he a brother, a roommate, or a father?\n&#xD;&#xA;Click on the Personality button and choose Edit Relationships.
You can add and edit relationships in this household.  Learn More?  NOT USED, IF YOU SEE THIS ITS A BUG
Randomize
Random is also available from within many of the detail pop outs (clothing, face details, hair style, …).  Use this random option to randomize the specific catalog sort you are browsing.
Randomize your Sim to find a good starting point for their appearance.\n&#xD;&#xA;See something you like?  But maybe the face isn't quite right, or the clothing choice isn't what you are looking for?  Open up the Randomize pop out and select the specific parts you want to randomize.
Personality
Traits are an important part of defining your Sim's Personality.  Click on the Pick a Trait buttons to select up to 3 Traits from the categories available.\n&#xD;&#xA;Some Traits can't be paired with other Traits. You can't be both Good and Evil. And there are no negative Traits. They all provide unique opportunities for your Sims.

(From being disappointed one time too many by grandchildren)
Dear {0.SimName},\n\nI leave to you the sum of {1.Money} as a reminder of the hard work and dedication that your grandfather and I put into amassing our wealth. However, I have concerns that if I left too much to you and your siblings, it may only serve to encourage your reckless behavior. This small sum is meant to help you stay afloat, but it is also a reminder that you must take responsibility for your own success.\n\nI implore you to cherish your siblings and work together to establish a legacy of your own. Do not rely solely on the wealth that has been left to you, but use it wisely and in a way that benefits both yourself and your family. It is time to grow up and prove yourself as a responsible and productive member of society.\n\nWith cautious optimism for your future,\n\nGrandmother
The Last Will and Testament of the Family's Estate
Dear {0.SimName},\n\nIt is with great pleasure that I bequeath to you the sum of {1.Money}. Your grandfather and I worked tirelessly for many years to amass this wealth, and it gives me great comfort to know that it will be put to good use. This Off-the-Grid household is generating a water surplus. Objects that use water will now fully work as long as more water is generated than is being used. 
This Off-the-Grid household has used up the last of its water reserves. Until a water surplus is achieved, objects that need water will no longer function normally or at all.
This household has been reconnected to the utility grid. Objects that use water and power will now work even without utility surpluses, and bills for utilities will resume. 
This Off-the-Grid household is generating a power surplus. Objects that use power will now fully work as long as more power is generated than is being used. 
This Off-the-Grid household has used up the last of its power reserves. Until a power surplus is achieved, objects that need power will no longer function normally or at all.

Here is a list of some of the experiences you can have during your trial of Discover University:\n\n&lt;ul type=&quot;circle&quot;&gt;&lt;li&gt;Earn a Scholarship and start a career in Law, Engineering, or Education&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Bicycle in style around campus&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Compete in Juice Pong... and Ping Pong!&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Decorate your dorm room and make it your own!&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Join a student organization, there is something for everyone&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Learn Robotics and create your very own Servo&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Befriend the campus Mascots&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;
Discover University
Britechester
Begin a new chapter in the historical University of Britechester or modern Foxbury Institute. Live in a dorm room or off-campus in the welcoming town of Gibbs Hill. Explore Britechester on a bicycle, spend time in the student commons, and have a study session at the library. Cheer on the student body at a school spirit event and wear school colors to show your Sim’s pride.
Historic Mysteries
From campus ghosts to an elusive Secret Society, Britechester boasts its share of the unexplained
Foxbury Institute Campus
Come visit the innovative campus of Foxbury to see if a future in technology is right for you
University of Britechester Campus
Come tour the historic University of Britechester where a budding artist can flourish!
Express Your Campus Style
Meet, Mingle, and Explore!
Stay Classy
Settle Into School
Start your investigation and solve the mystery of a desert town that holds a deep, dark secret.
StrangerVille
StrangerVille
Work hard and play hard with animal friends, ranch hands, and your own stretch of land in The Sims™ 4 Horse Ranch!
Horse Ranch
Horse Ranch
Chestnut Ridge
This community formed when several groups embraced their mutual connection to Horses and the land. The area soon became known as a hub for all things Equestrian: a town steeped in expertise with raising and training Horses, set against a beautiful and expansive landscape. Over time, the area became famous for another endeavor, as the rich soil brought in the new enterprise of Nectar Making. Thanks to the hard work of everyone involved, the region flourished and became the Chestnut Ridge it is today.
Rare Fishing Spots
Find incredible fishing spots with some of the rarest fish you'll ever catch in your life! There's no better place to cast out a line and let yourself relax and unwind from the hustle and bustle of daily life.
Go Horseback Riding
The trails in Galloping Gulch offer incredible views and sweeping vistas. Take your horse out and enjoy the sights and sounds, find places to camp and light a fire, or spend the night hunting for the mysterious ghost horse that haunts the park.
Explore Dreadhorse Caverns
Located in the southwestern corner of Galloping Gulch quietly nestled beneath some trees, &lt;B&gt;Dreadhorse Caverns&lt;/B&gt; is a vast cave full of bats, bears, and giant spiders! Dance battle your way down further and further into the abyss! Solve riddles, collecting rare reward items, and find the underground land of the unicorns! How deep can you go?
Design a soft and playful bedroom that’s perfect for daydreaming with The Sims™ 4 Pastel Pop Kit!

Pastel Pop

Avant Basic

Cottage Living
Cottage Living
Henford-on-Bagley
From the natural beauty of Cordelia Falls to the clear, brisk currents of the River Bagley, the mingling of earth and water makes Henford-on-Bagley a lovely place to visit but perhaps an even lovelier place to live. Villagers here connect with the history of the land while finding friendship in the the furry and feathery creatures that inhabit the woods. So what if the average neighbor is a little more gossipy? You couldn't ask for a better place to grow, tend, and nurture a more natural life.
Weekly Fair
Enter the weekly fair for a chance to prove that your animal, produce, or cooking is the cream of the crop
A Cozy Village
The small but lively village of Finchwick is home to friendly locals and shop stalls
Ramble the Bramblewood
Gather mushrooms, befriend wild rabbits and birds, enjoy the ruins, and stop by Sophie the Snail in these lush woods

Urban Homage
Customize hoofed friends in Create a Sim or get new Horses by rescuing, purchasing, or breeding! Learn the Riding Skill and train Horses in Temperament, Agility, and Jumping Skills to compete at the Equestrian Center.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Tea Time Solarium Kit
Tasteful &amp; Tasty
An elegant tea party requires a beautiful space, good conversation, and – of course – tea, as well as other refreshments. This collection features a delicate tea set and treat tray that are both functional and lovely to look at, as well as a new banquet table.
Gatherings in Glass
Design a social space that is not quite outside, yet separate from the bustle of your house. With windowed walls, a flowering trellis, and a discrete rock-shaped speaker, you can craft the perfect spot to spill the tea with friends.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 SpongeBob Kid's Room Kit
Fandom Fashion
Display your love of SpongeBob with comfy clothes! There’s a t-shirt, pjs, and you’ll feel especially snuggly in slippers that look like SpongeBob, or his friends. Take your favorite character wherever you go!
A Cheerful Room
Plaster the walls with decals of your favorite characters, including SpongeBob and Patrick! There are toys, like a dollhouse replica of The Krusty Krab, plus pineapple furniture including a dresser and bookshelf ! It’s a collection that’ll make even the sourest squid smile.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Luxury Party Stuff
Experience the all-new Fountain of Mirth
Take advantage of the Mixology and Cooking skills to serve a variety of drinks and snacks, or use the Mischief skill to make things more “exciting” by adding a little something extra. You can find this item in the Bars category in Build Mode.
Indulge in the all-new Buffet Table 
Delight your guests’ with new recipes via a quick click on the table, or prepare and serve your own elevated cuisine! You can find this item in the Bars category in Build Mode.
Dress to impress 
From sparkly sequin dresses to shiny 3-piece tuxedos, your Sims will be the best dressed at any black tie event - or just any event period. Complete their glamorous look with new hairstyles and accessories.  
Party in Style, Live in Luxury 
Throw the most lavish party in town with a collection of flashy furniture &amp; decorations. Add fun and elegant pieces to your Sim’s home.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 First Fits Kit
Fashion is 24/7
Dress child Sims in trendy looks that are fit for birthday parties, the classroom, or just hanging out with friends. These casual looks don’t require a special occasion, but they won’t be out of place at one either.
Dressed to Express
A lifetime of fashion choices starts when you become a big kid and can dress yourself. Give child Sims more ways to express themselves with the kinds of leopard-print jackets, patterned leggings, and colorful shades they’ll want to wear when they grow up.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Bust the Dust Kit
Suck It Up
Find full-size and handheld vacuums in Build Mode for your fight against the encroaching dust. Make your Sim’s chores easier—and more fun! Even kids can help out.
Clean Up Your Act
Explore two new aspirations! Perfectly Pristine Sims won’t let a single speck of dirt remain, while Fabulously Filthy Sims revel in allowing grime to thrive.
Avoid Dust-Ups
What starts as a film of dust builds up into piles, and then takes on a life of its own! As time passes, homes go from clean to dusty to filthy if Sims don’t clean up.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Courtyard Oasis Kit
Go Natural
Invite a refreshing breeze and bright sunlight into the home with new columns, archways, and beautifully latticed wooden windows.
Create Your Oasis
Play with filigree designs, vivid colors, and intricate tile patterns to tie it together, then decorate with hanging lanterns, resplendent textiles, and tropical plants.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Paranormal Stuff
Calm the Spirits
Master the Medium skill and impress Guidry to get a Paranormal Investigator license! With mysterious activity on the rise, it’s up to your Sim to put a stop to it.
Cleanse Your Home
Guidry the Ghost is happy to advise you. Remove accursed objects, perform a séance, commune with the dead, and receive gifts from specters! You can even summon Bonehilda the skeletal maid.
Expect Visitors
Cuteness will absolutely get them everywhere! Appease the mischievous specters to relax in serenity, or let them run amok for scares day and night.
Meet Ghastly Roommates
Your new-to-you home might be home to someone else, too, if it’s one of the new Haunted House Lots!
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 SpongeBob's House Kit
Décor from the Depths
Fill your space with items from Bikini Bottom: furniture from floaties or salvaged from ships, a peculiar plant, nautical knickknacks, and more including doors and wallpapers with a variety of swatches from Spongebob’s living room.
Who Lives in a Pineapple?
A pineapple is technically a berry, and your house can be too! Use siding, a roof pattern, and spikey leaves to create a home fit for your quirkiest Sims. You can even use a sand-like floor tile to give your home an “under the sea” feeling.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Little Campers Kit
A Crafty Look
That’s not a cardboard box — it’s a car! Or a rocket ship. Embrace DIY aesthetics with toys, blanket-forts, and even an outdoor projector made out of a bed sheet and other household items.
For the Kids
Let the kids take over the back yard with cute furniture, playful camping gear, and toys. Create childhood memories roasting marshmallows with your stuffed sasquatch pal in the glow of a million string lights.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Blooming Rooms Kit
A Piece of the Outdoors... Inside!
Fill your Sim’s home with cheerful, peaceful plants. Delight in a lush, soothing atmosphere of growth all around with unexpected leafy details and natural beauty.
It's Easy Being Green
Potted and hanging plants transform any room into a small slice of paradise. Vibrant vegetation even takes the place of curtains and wall art. With so many verdant colors, it will feel like living in a literal greenhouse.
Liven Up Your Space
Shelving, tables, and even light fixtures become living décor with the addition of enchanting foliage.

Update your Sims’ intimate wardrobe with fashions based on current material, color, and pattern trends. Lacey bodysuits, a variety of underwear styles, and boxers with playful prints will have your Sims’ bedrooms feeling like runways.

Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Cottage Living
Enjoy the Simple Living
Benefit from higher quality food while using the new Simple Living Lot Challenge. This new Lot Challenge will require your Sims to cook with fresh ingredients for each meal. Will your Sims be up for the challenge?
Embrace the Countryside
Henford-on-Bagley is nestled in the cozy countryside where everyone knows everyone. Pack for a lovely Picnic or a lose yourself in a Cross-stitch session. Get to know the locals at &lt;i&gt;The Gnome's Arms Pub&lt;/i&gt;, and learn about the town from your neighbors!
Live Off the Land
Whether Sims grow their own produce, gather from the wild, or visit the village market, fresh is best! Up for a challenge? Try growing oversized crops to enter into the competition at the Finchwick Fair.
Raise or Befriend Animals
Chickens and Cows can provide Sims with Eggs and Milk, Llamas provide Wool for crafts (just don’t get spit on!), Wild Birds share their sweet songs, and Rabbits will freely roam… but keep an eye out for mischievous Foxes.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Kitchen Clutter Kit
Family Friendly
The functional, family-focused items in this kit include a lunchbox, kitchen timer, recipe tablet, cookie jar, and more. Whether Sims are cooking or grabbing a quick bite to go, this kit has them covered. It’s perfect for busy families!
Signs of Life
A whole lot of living happens in the kitchen, and this kit will help you highlight that with groceries, open cereal boxes, cleaning supplies, and more. There’s even a refrigerator with magnets and drawings to show the impact of the family on the space around them.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 City Living
Embark on New, Metropolitan Careers
Embark on new careers! Make dramatic speeches as you fight for a cause as a Politician. Show the world how cultured you are as a Food or Art Critic. Inspire the masses and earn followers working in Social Media.
Work Your Way Up from Starter Apartment to Penthouse
Each apartment has unique traits that will enhance your Sims' gameplay. Experience the charm and thrill of your first apartment. Help your Sims work their way up to living in a Skyscraper Penthouse, with panoramic views.
Discover Lively, Cultural Festivals
Enrich and grow your Sims by taking them to different festivals all over the city where they can watch street performers, enter competitions, and meet Sims from different walks of life.
Explore the City of San Myshuno
Explore a densely populated city with a variety of neighborhoods. Paint a mural in the Arts Quarter, sing your heart out at the Karaoke Bar in the Fashion District or shoot hoops in the Spice Market.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Laundry Day Stuff
Dress in Country Style
Outfit your Sims in country-themed attire from floral patterns to everyday denim. Styles include free-flowing tops and bottoms made from natural cotton fibers. Try hassle-free hairstyles that complement your Sims’ comfortable new looks.
Build a Rustic Home
Transform your Sims' home with country-inspired décor that best suits your Sims’ lifestyle. Discover new ways to decorate household rooms with wooden tables and wicker furniture. Add decorative items to rooms from colorful rugs and lively succulents!
Wash Your Wardrobe
Gather your Sims’ laundry, load the washing machine, and then toss them in the dryer for a pristine look. Your Sims can also hand wash their clothes in a washtub, then line dry for a spotless outfit that other Sims will surely notice!

Capture the spirit and aesthetic of Brazil's Carnaval with dynamic clothing, makeup, and accessories for all Sims. The fluidity of the collection encourages Sims to blend these interesting pieces into any look for an abundance of joy.

Herbalism Skill

Welcome to The Sims™ 4 For Rent Expansion Pack
Bustling and Beautiful
Explore a new world that’s alive with possibilities. Visit the botanical garden and discover an animal sanctuary! One of the most iconic scenes Tomarang has to offer is the Night Market where your Sims will discover new foods and unique objects.
Closer Than Ever
Pair your shining creations with hints of mystery and intrigue. The clothing and furniture in this pack is perfect for a cozy workroom! There's even a set of dreamy jewelry created in collaboration with Simmer Arethabee and available in CAS.
All Charged Up
Search out crystals or pluck them off the Crystal Tree and get ready to supercharge! Charged crystals will affect the moods and lives of Sims; the pieces you craft will truly be life changing.
Jewelry By You
Fill your collection with colorful new crystals and metals that can be used to create sparkling jewelry. Aspiring jewelers can build up their new skill by using the Gemology Table to cut crystals and get creative with jewelry customization.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Riviera Retreat Kit
Natural Charm
Set your comfortable linen furniture up among rustic décor and earthy features like stone pavers. This space is timeless, blending the fresh and clean with the natural to create a space where troubles melt away.
Alone at Last
It’s time to relax in a wicker lounge chair, watching as sunlight shines through the vine-covered pergola and sparkles in your private waterfall. Create the perfect, secret spot for your Sim to spend some quality time alone, or with someone special.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Enchanted by Nature
A Land of Enchantment
Innisgreen is a lush world with three neighborhoods: Coast of Adhmor, focused on Gnomes; Sprucederry Grove, blending nature and civilization; and magical Everdew forest. Meet Mother Nature, become a Fairy, and summon Spruce Almighty for adventures!
A Balanced Lifestyle
Negative emotions cause Imbalance, leading to Ailments. Become a Naturopath using the Apothecary Table to cure Sims and hone your skill. Pursue the Elixir Enthusiast Aspiration. Watch your Luck—it affects cooking and Ailments.
The Fairest Folk
Become a Fairy! Use Abilities to nurture plants, change moods, and more. Choose Harmonious or Discordant paths with the Fairy Stories Aspiration. Create Fairies with wings and tattoos. Even non-Fairies can use Fairy Dust for enchantment!
Life Among the Trees
Step into nature with the Natural Living Skill. Sims can thrive outdoors, foraging for food and plants; perfect for the Nature Nomad Aspiration. Bring nature inside with Live Houseplants. Explore new Traits: Plant Lover, Mystical, and Disruptive.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Growing Together
Family Ties
The bonds between your related Sims are important and complex. As they experience life together there will be opportunities for both drama and unity that will affect family dynamics and Sims’ relationships with their family members.
Social Dynamics
Sometimes Sims just click. Your Sim might have natural social chemistry with a Sim they meet at a party – or they might naturally clash. Your Sim will now have preferences that determine which Sims they are socially compatible with, and which Sims are more likely to become their enemies.
Perfect for Families
Located along an ocean bay, San Sequoia was once a small fishing village and has grown into a bustling town. It features quiet suburbs, a lively rec center, a tight-knit community, and even an influential local family – the Robleses.
A Lasting Impact
Key choices and milestones will help to shape who your Sims are. Unlock and change personality traits throughout your Sims’ lives as they cope with midlife crises, respond to family requests to move in, and more. Self-discovery is a lifelong journey.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Jungle Adventure
Collect Ancient Artifacts
Sims can excavate and examine these precious objects closely at the archeology table, determining their quality, but watch out for ones that are fake!
Explore the Jungle
Sims gear up in hiking attire and prepare for danger as they trek deep into the jungle, revealing hidden pools, ancient artifact sites and ruins. Beware of natural dangers and obstacles, from deadly bees to poisonous spiders!
Discover a Hidden Temple
Venture deep inside the mysterious rooms where Sims may find priceless relics, great treasures or doom! Have your Sims visit again, where they will experience new challenges and uncover different treasures or traps.
Venture to Selvadorada
Your Sims can try traditional foods, dance to new music, practice native customs and shop for authentic décor. Dress your Sims in local fashion from outfits full of colorful patterns to durable clothing suitable for the jungle!
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Nifty Knitting Stuff
Shop Online with Plopsy
The more you knit, the more you can earn on Plopsy, the new online crafting marketplace. List or buy everything from socks to sweaters to paintings and woodworking projects. For a small fee, you can find the perfect buyer to make the most profit!
Prepare to Rock
Plop down in one of the four new rocking chair variants to relax, knit, nap, or read a book. Elder Sims also have a new Reminiscence interaction. Recall the days of youth gone by in utter comfort, no matter what you remember.
Get Knitty with It
With a Yarn Basket, everyone from children to elders can pick up their new favorite hobby. Knit clothing for the whole family, or decorate with knitted plant hangers, rugs, and even toys for kids!

Scattering used coffee cups to show your Sim is a big fan of caffeine or adding makeup and jewelry boxes to the top of their dresser for a hint at their morning routine are just a couple examples of the visual storytelling this kit empowers. 
It’s Personal
A cell phone case in your Sim’s favorite color, a stack of books and games placed off to the side in their living room, a creative display of pictures – this collection includes tons of small, personal, touches that will make your Sim’s house feel more like home.

Have Sims decorate their living room with uniquely-designed décor and paw-some pet-inspired furniture for the kids’ room. From cute cat pillows for your Sims to bright beds for your cats and dogs, there is something for everyone.
Dress Your Cats and Dogs
Show your Sims and their pets are made for each other with matching pet outfits like a comfy robe and purr-fect pajamas. Put a glamorous dress on your feline friend or have your dog don a hat for the right occasion.
Care for a New Pet
Add a habitat to your household with all-new small pets like a hamster, rat, pygmy hedgehog, or miniature bubalus! Have your Sims name their new pet and learn how to take care of them.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Snowy Escape
Define Your Lifestyle
Unlock new personality and relationship effects with Lifestyles and Sentiments. Lifestyles manifest in response to your Sim’s actions and habits. Similarly, shared experiences inspire Sentiments and have a lasting impact on Sims’ relationships.
Create Your Sanctuary
Whether you prefer the traditional details or modern touches of Japanese-inspired furniture and décor, you can incorporate shoji doors, windows and screens, tatami mats, and more to design a home that complements your life.
Find Your Zen
Sim’s worries will float away in the natural hot springs, then unwind over hot pot around the kotatsu table or socialize while hiking through bamboo forests and snowy terrain.
Chase Your Thrills
Test your Sim’s skill and endurance with activities on the mountainside! Grab skis for a downhill ride, strap on a snowboard to shred, or bundle up on a sled with another Sim.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Get to Work
Retail
Sims interested in managing a store to earn some extra Simoleons can now run a business! Jump start your Sim’s entrepreneurial dreams by purchasing a Retail Store via the phone.
Scientist Career
Sims in the scientist career can conduct research and collect specimens that can be used to discover new compounds and devices. Your Sim's creations can even lead to new inventions!
Doctor Career
Head to the hospital and spend your Sim's days saving lives. Sims in the doctor career start off as Medical Interns but with a little hard work, they can become seasoned surgeons!
Detective Career
Your Sim can join the ranks of Willow Creek's finest as a detective! Follow your Sim as they patrol the streets, investigate crime scenes, and solve cases at the police station. 
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Incheon Arrivals Kit
Let It Flow
Structured oversize pieces combine with flowy materials for a study in contrasts. Find comfort in baggy silhouettes and understated details like a high waist and half-tucked shirts.
Mix and Match
Dress for any occasion with both semi-formal and casual pieces. Blazers, coats, jackets, and cardigans pair neatly with loose-fitting skirts, sweatpants, slacks, and pants, topped off with sneakers or heeled boots.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Dream Home Decorator
The Big Reveal!
Hopefully, your work inspires happy crying instead of tears of disappointment. Unveil the results to see how your clients react to their personalized home makeover!
Renovate, Redecorate, Remodel
Whether it’s revamping a single room, redoing an entire lot, or refurbishing a commercial space, your goal is to make your clients happy. You’re in charge of all the details.
Know Your Clients
It’s not just about a Client’s needs, but also their Preferences and their budget. Find out what your Client's Likes and Dislikes and keep those in mind while coming up with designs to get a glowing recommendation.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Desert Luxe Kit
Fun and Function
Arrange a bar, loveseat, fireplace, and more to look like functional architectural elements built into your space and create the perfect venue for your Sim’s next big party or intimate dinner.
Decidedly Neutral
This collection features neutral colors inspired by the natural landscape of the Southwestern desert and materials like stone and wood. The overall look is luxurious and understated – ideal for building a relaxing oasis in your Sims’ home or on their patio.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Eco Lifestyle
Upcycled Decor
Need to outfit a starter house on a budget? Do it basically for free by fishing out a few pre-used items like a worn-out mattress you can fix or a lightly singed oven you can shine up.
Change the World
Every decision you make—what power sources you rely on, how you design your home, and which Neighborhood Action Plans you vote for—influences the state of the world, from smoggy skies to crystal-clear water.
Collaborative Community
Engage with your neighborhood through the new voting board, which features different Neighborhood Action Plans each week. Everyone in the community has a voice. Your vote matters!
Sustainable Living
Reduce, reuse, and recycle! Not only is it good for the environment, but it saves you Simoleons, too.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Bowling Night Stuff

Miss your friends? Give access to your place to close friends and family with a key and they’ll be sure to pay you a surprise visit.
Quickly find residential and commercial lot required objects by selecting the objects in the requirement panel.
Copy rooms, roof shapes, or stairs sizes by selecting them and using the copy tool.
Things keep breaking at your place? Magical Gnomes will fix them with the Gnomes Lot Trait!
Schmooze with your Landlord often; who knows when you’ll need him/her to fix a thing or two…
Food Stalls are a great way to discover new foods and unlock their recipes.
Are you the ultimate geek? Test your programming and video game skills at GeekCon!
How hot is too hot? Try out the Curry Challenge at the Spice Festival.
Waterfalls generally contain rare types of fish.

Hidden Lifestyle in Progress
Lifestyles are an expression of a Sim's behaviors and habits over time. A Sim can only work towards or against a lifestyle so much in a given day.&#xD;&#xA;&lt;font color='#D91A1A'&gt;Your Sim will need to lose an active Lifestyle in order to progress in a new one.&lt;/font&gt;
Your Sim has not performed any actions that would unlock this Lifestyle. Have your Sim try something they have not done before.

It seems there is no phone service in the area.
Himalayan
These cats are sweet-tempered, intelligent, and generally very social and good companions. Because of their heritage from the Siamese cats, they tend to be more active than Persians.
Golden Retriever
The Golden Retriever is a large-sized breed of dog bred as gun dogs to retrieve shot waterfowl such as ducks and upland game birds during hunting and shooting parties, and were named 'retriever' because of their ability to retrieve shot game undamaged. Jill will change this and likely remove references to guns and things that they shoot.
American Bobtail
The American Bobtail is an uncommon breed of domestic cat which was developed in the late 1960s. It is most notable for its stubby &quot;bobbed&quot; tail about one-third to one-half the length of a normal cat's tail.
Standard Schnauzer
Distinguished by their long beards and eyebrows, Standard Schnauzers are always pepper and salt or less commonly black in color, with a stiff and wiry hair coat on the body similar to that of other wirehaired breeds.
Chihuahua
How a Chihuahua turns out depends mightily on the genetic temperament of his parents and grandparents. Chihuahuas can be easily provoked to attack, and are therefore generally unsuitable for homes with small children. The breed tends to be fiercely loyal to one particular person and in some cases may become over protective of the person, especially around other people or animals.
Calico
Calico cats are domestic cats with a spotted or particolored coat that is predominantly white, with patches of two other colors.
Wire Fox Terrier
Two of the wire fox terrier's most distinctive traits are its energy and intelligence. It has a low threshold for boredom and requires stimulation, exercise and attention. The wire fox terrier is a companion animal that requires near-constant attention.
Welsh Springer Spaniel
The Welsh Springer Spaniel is active, loyal, and affectionate. They may meet strangers barking when in their territory, or act aloof, cautious or wary. The breed is well known for being friendly and demonstrative to all members of the family, especially children, and accepting other pets of the household with a friendly, playful attitude.
LaPerm
The LaPerm is in many ways a cat of moderation with no extremes and is still true to its original type. It does however have an unusual coat.
West Highland White Terrier
The temperament of the West Highland White Terrier can vary greatly, with some being friendly towards children, whilst others prefer solitude. It will not tolerate rough handling such as a child pulling on its ears, and can be both food- and toy-possessive.
Field Spaniel
The Field Spaniel can be a good family dog while it has a job to do. They are suitable for dog agility and hunting. Without some sort of purpose, the dog can often try to amuse itself and cause mischief.
Persian
The Persian cat is a long-haired breed of cat characterized by its round face and short muzzle. In Britain, it is sometimes called the Longhair or Persian Longhair. It is also known as the Shirazi cat or Iranian cat, particularly in the Middle East. Jill will change this.
Otterhound
The Otterhound is a large, rough-coated hound with an imposing head. Originally bred for hunting, it has great strength and a strong body with long striding steps. This makes it able to perform prolonged hard work. 
Goldendoodle
A Goldendoodle is a cross-breed obtained by breeding a golden retriever with a poodle. The original purpose of the cross was to attempt to develop guide dogs suitable for visually impaired individuals with allergies.
Singapura
The Singapura is one of the smallest breeds of cats, noted for its large eyes and ears, brown ticked coat and blunt tail.
Husky
Husky is a general name for a sled-type of dog used in northern regions, differentiated from other sled-dog types by their fast pulling style. They are an ever-changing cross-breed of the fastest dogs.
Chesapeake Bay Retriever
The quintessential Chesapeake Bay Retriever has a bright and happy disposition, intelligence, quiet good sense, and an affectionate protective nature. Some can be quite vocal when happy, and some will 'smile' by baring their front teeth in a peculiar grin.
Oriental Longhair
The oriental longhair is a really active cat that likes to play a lot. If the owner does not have the time to do so, it will find a toy to play on its own. This breed enjoys jumping and does it really well, without breaking any objects due to its agility and elegance.
Curly Coated Retriever
The Curly Coated Retriever was originally developed as a gun dog and their temperament and conformation reflect this purpose. Curlies are still used in many countries as bird hunting companions, including in both upland and waterfowl hunting.
Afghan Hound
The temperament of the typical Afghan Hound can be aloof and dignified, but happy and clownish when it's playing. This breed, as is the case with many sighthounds, has a high prey drive and may not get along with small animals. 
Birman
The Birman, also called the &quot;Sacred Cat of Burma&quot;,[1] is a domestic cat breed. The Birman is a long-haired, color-pointed cat distinguished by a silky coat, deep blue eyes, and contrasting white &quot;gloves&quot; or &quot;socks&quot; on each paw.
Polish Lowland Sheepdog
Polish Lowland Sheepdogs are stable and self-confident. They have an excellent memory and can be well trained, but may dominate a weak-willed owner.
Toy Fox Terrier
Toy Fox Terriers, like many active and intelligent breeds, can learn to respond to a number of words. Toy Fox Terriers were used commonly in circus shows by clowns, and they are said to make great companions for owners with a good sense of humor.
Portuguese Water Dog
Portuguese Water dogs make excellent companions.They are loving, independent, and intelligent and are easily trained in obedience and agility skills. Once introduced, they are generally friendly to strangers, and enjoy being petted, which, due to their soft, fluffy coats, is a favour that human beings willingly grant them.
Irish Red and White Setter
The Irish Red and White setter can be the most devoted and affectionate of dogs making them ideal all-round family dogs. They are extremely intelligent and respond well to proper training but they do need to have plenty to occupy them.
Boston Terrier
The Boston Terrier is a gentle breed that typically has a strong, happy-go-lucky, and friendly personality with a merry sense of humour. Bostons are generally eager to please their owner and can be easily trained.
Schnauzer
Schnauzer comes from the German word for &quot;snout&quot; and means colloquially &quot;moustache&quot;, because of the dog's distinctively bearded snout. Although the schnauzer is considered a terrier-type dog, they do not have the typical terrier temperament.
British Longhair
The British Longhair is a longer-haired development from the longstanding British Shorthair breed. In the mid-20th century, British Shorthairs were interbred with imported long-haired varieties with an aim to producing more stout and round-faced stock, while retaining the short coat
Black and Tan Coonhound
The Black and Tan Coonhound makes a suitable pet: it is mellow, amiable, calm, and unobtrusive indoors; outdoors, its strong hunting instinct takes over and it can be difficult to turn it from tracking after it starts trailing.
Old English Sheepdog
The breed standards describe the ideal Old English Sheepdog as never being nervous or aggressive. The Old English Sheepdog comes from the very old pastoral type dogs but no records were kept of the dogs, and everything about the earliest types is guesswork.
Sphynx
Sphynxes are known for their extroverted behavior. They display a high level of energy, intelligence, curiosity, and affection for their owners.
Basenji
The Basenji is alert, energetic, curious and reserved with strangers. The Basenji tends to become emotionally attached to a single human. Basenjis may not get along with non-canine pets.
Scottish Fold
The Scottish Fold is a breed of domestic cat with a natural dominant-gene mutation that affects cartilage throughout the body, causing the ears to &quot;fold&quot;, bending forward and down towards the front of their head, which gives the cat what is often described as an &quot;owl-like&quot; appearance.
Havana Brown
The Havana Brown is an intelligent cat that often uses its paws both to examine objects and to communicate with its owners. Curiosity brings them to the door as visitors arrive rather than preferring to be hidden as many cats will do.
Miniature Schnauzer
Usually easy to train, Miniature Schnauzers tend to be excellent watchdogs with a good territorial instinct, but more inclined toward barking than biting.
Brittany
The Brittany was originally bred as a hunting dog and noted for being easy to train and sweet-natured. The breed is generally more sensitive to correction than other hunters, and harsh corrections are often unnecessary.
Great Dane
The Great Dane is a large German breed of domestic dog known for its giant size. The German name of the breed is Deutsche Dogge, or German Mastiff. The French name is Dogue Allemand. The Great Dane is one of the tallest dog breeds. Jill will change this. 
Doberman Pinscher
Although they are considered to be working dogs, Doberman Pinschers are often stereotyped as being ferocious and aggressive. As a personal protection dog, the Doberman was originally bred for these traits.
Miniature Pinscher
Miniature Pinschers are for experienced dog owners. The Miniature Pinscher is an assertive, outgoing, active and independent breed. Miniature pinschers are energetic and need a fenced in yard to run in; they make great agility dogs.
English Foxhound
The English Foxhound is a pack hound, therefore, it gets along well with other dogs and enjoys human companionship. It gets along with horses, children, and other pets, as it is a gentle, social, and tolerant breed.
Pomeranian
Pomeranians are typically friendly, playful and lively but can be aggressive to other dogs and try to prove themselves. Pomeranians are alert and aware of changes in their environment, and barking at new stimuli can develop into a habit of barking excessively in any situation.
Saint Bernard
The St. Bernard or St Bernard is a breed of very large working dog from the western Alps in Switzerland, Italy and France, originally bred at the Great and Little St Bernard Pass for rescue. Jill will change this.
Cocker Spaniel
Cocker Spaniels were originally bred as hunting dogs with the term cocker deriving from their use to hunt the Eurasian woodcock.
Abyssinian
The Abyssinian is a breed of domestic short-haired cat with a distinctive &quot;ticked&quot; tabby coat, in which individual hairs are banded with different colors.
Siamese
Siamese are usually very affectionate and intelligent cats, renowned for their social nature. Many enjoy being with people and are sometimes described as &quot;extroverts&quot;. Often they bond strongly to a single person. Some Siamese are extremely vocal, with a loud, low-pitched voice—known as &quot;Meezer&quot;, from which they get one of their nicknames.

The Verdant Accord
The lands of the realm shall flourish! Plants will have an increased growth rate. Rarer crystals, metals, fossils and frogs may appear across the land. Fishing is also more bountiful with rarer and larger fish appearing in the waters of the Kingdom!   
The Doctrine of Vitality
All citizens shall be encouraged to embody vigor and discipline! Sims in the Kingdom will increase their Fitness skill over time. Sims in fitness related careers will also have increased Career Performance.  
The Technocrats Mandate
The Crown has a vision for a future guided by intellect and precision. Across the Kingdom, technical related skills will increase, as will technical Career Performance.\n
The Culinary Edict
The crown praises the art of cuisine. Food and Drink across the Kingdom will flourish and be of improved quality. Food-related careers will also enjoy increased Career Performance. 
The Edict of Enlightenment
Knowledge is the backbone of a strong kingdom. Young Sims in the Kingdom will finish homework, school projects and presentations faster. Good grades will be easier to achieve. 
The Artisan’s Proclamation
Let it be known that craftsmanship shall thrive under royal patronage. Crafting skills will increase more. Busking will earn more, and Sims in certain creative careers will enjoy increased Career Performance.   
The Silver Charter
The wisdom of age shall be honored. The realm shall safeguard its elders with dignity and care! Elders can enjoy increased skill gain and a reduced risk of WooHoo-induced overexertion. \n
The Cradle Accord
The Crown calls for a time of prosperity and family! Sims in the Kingdom will have a higher success rate of becoming pregnant and a higher chance of pregnancy resulting in twins or triplets. Toddlers will also have elevated skill gain.

Content Sharing Currently Disabled
The Gallery includes creations from other platforms.\nTo participate please open Settings, Select Privacy and Online Safety under the Accounts tab, select Xbox Live Privacy, select View details and Customize, select Game Content, and set upload community creations to Everyone. \nXbox Live does not monitor or enforce standards of conduct by players outside of the Xbox Live network. The Gallery includes creations from other platforms.\nTo participate please open Settings, Select Privacy and Online Safety under the Accounts tab, select Xbox Live Privacy, select View details and Customize, select Communication and Multiplayer, and enable play with people outside of Xbox Live.\nXbox Live does not monitor or enforce standards of conduct by players outside of the Xbox Live network. See the EA User Agreement and Privacy and Cookie Policy.

Customize your experience by selecting which Packs to load. Disabling Packs removes their specific content, such as hair, clothing, objects, and gameplay functions from saved games. We recommend only disabling Packs when starting a new Saved Game to avoid any unintended loss of content and progress.\n&lt;i&gt;Keep in mind, the confirmation process may take longer as more Packs are selected.&lt;/i&gt;

Reward Claimed!
{0.SimFirstName} is Imbalanced, which will probably manifest in some unfortunate way.
Balance &amp; Imbalance expresses how a Sim's Mood affects them over time, beyond moment-to-moment.\n\nSims that generally spend more time in negative Moods will move toward Imbalance, while positive Moods move back toward Balance. Some major life events can also change balance instantly!\n\nImbalance comes with various effects, such as impacted Needs or very high vulnerability to Ailments.
Balance &amp; Imbalance
Beyond the emotional ups and downs each day brings, {0.SimFirstName} is Balanced.
Balanced
{0.SimFirstName} has stayed in a good Mood lately and is currently feeling Balanced.

Select Behavior
Plan out what Sims will be doing throughout the day! A Custom Venue's schedule is divided into timeslots, and during each one, both a &lt;b&gt;Main Activity&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;Role activities&lt;/b&gt; can be set.\n\nThe Main Activity sets the tone and guides what Sims on the lot will naturally do during that time. Role activities give individual Sims something more personalized to do based on their role in the event. Keep in mind each timeslot must last at least 3 hours.
Plan out what Sims will be doing throughout the day! A Getaway's schedule is divided into timeslots, and during each one, both &lt;b&gt;Main Activity&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;Role activities&lt;/b&gt; can be set.\n\nThe Main Activity sets the tone and guides what Sims on the lot will naturally do during that time. Role activities give individual Sims something more personalized to do based on their role in the event.\n\nAny changes made to a role that differ from its default Role activities will be marked with a yellow dot! To save your changes as a new role or existing, select &lt;b&gt;Save Role&lt;/b&gt; in the timeslot.
No available times at which to add a new timeslot.

Neighborhood Stories
While enabled, Neighborhood Stories will trigger life changes for Households and individual Sims that are not currently being played. Configure which types of life changes are allowed by going to the Manage Households menu. Independently customize configurations for all of My Households, Other Households, or specific Sim Households.\n\nUncheck this box to disable Neighborhood Stories completely.
Enable Neighborhood Stories
Sims and Households that are Inactive (not currently being played) may undergo life changes according to Neighborhood Stories configurations in Manage Households.

Allows other Sims to call and extort Active Sims who have a secret, causing a Scandal if the Sim doesn't pay up.
Lifestyles are an expression of a Sim's behaviors and habits over time. When toggled on, Sims can acquire Lifestyles which changes autonomy and grants various gameplay effects per Sim. &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&quot;#EC262E&quot;&gt;Warning:&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; Turning this off will remove all Lifestyles from a save file.
Adjusts the lifespan of your Sims.  The higher this setting, the longer your Sims live.

Adjusts the level of free will that Sims demonstrate.  When Off, Sims will only react to events in order to preserve their own lives
Enables unplayed Sims, Cats, Dogs, and Horses to age over time. If disabled, they will not age up.
Frees up memory, reduces lag, improves frame rates, and helps prevent crashes. Restart required.\nRecovery saves will be labeled &quot;Memory Boost&quot;.&lt;i&gt;Compatible with DirectX 11 only.&lt;/i&gt;\nToggle Options: &quot;Automatic&quot; for game-managed settings, &quot;Enabled&quot; to activate (DirectX 11 only), or &quot;Disabled&quot; to keep original settings.\n\n&lt;b&gt;Switching modes may affect save compatibility.&lt;/b&gt;
Memory Boost\n(Early Access)
Enabled
Disabled
Automatic
Adjusts if Sims gain fame by default. If checked, Sims will no longer gain fame.\n\nThe following Sims will be affected:\n• Sims who have not yet gained any fame.\n• All newly created Sims.\n\nThe following Sims will not be affected:\n• Sims that have already gained any fame.\n• Sims who have had their fame settings individually adjusted in Live Mode.\n\nThis setting can be overridden, and the fame status of individual Sims can be changed at any time by selecting &quot;Step Into the Spotlight&quot; within the Fame Info window.
Toggling this option will adjust if Sims have the ability to gain fame by default or not.
Sims Begin Opted Out of Fame
* Eco Lifestyle gameplay does not appear in Destination Worlds or StrangerVille.
If disabled, voting at the Community Board is user-directed only.
Enable NPC Voting
If disabled, Neighborhood Action Plans and game objects will no longer affect the environment.
Enable Eco Footprint Gameplay
If enabled, architectural elements such as wallpaper, floor patterns, roof materials, doors, windows, pools, fountains, trees, and more will grant effects to gameplay elements like environment score, eco footprint, and utilities. Check the tooltips for each item to see what effects they might apply!

Change Camera settings in the Options Menu.

Use the &quot;B&quot; shortcut key in Build Mode to quickly select the Wall Tool.
Click on fishing signs found all over the world near water to fish.
Aspirations can be switched at any time without losing progress!
The computer has an interaction that lets you Adopt a new family member.
Pick up a guitar, violin, or piano to give the gift of music to your Sims!
Resize the game window by just dragging the edge in windowed mode.

Open Quirk Slot
Locked Quirk Slot 
\nThis quirk slot is locked until you've reached a higher Celebrity Level.
\nA celebrity's behavior determines what quirks they develop.
As a Sim increases their Celebrity Level, they drift further from normal life. At certain levels, Sims will gain new Quirk Slots, which can be filled with Quirks based on the behavior they engage in.\n\nOnce acquired, Quirks may be removed by using the Celestial Crystal Crown or drinking the Quirk-B-Gone reward potion. Removing a quirk will open up the slot, which may then get filled by a new quirk!\n\nThe Sim's current quirks may be seen under Earned Quirks, while all possible quirks can be seen under All Quirks.
Earned Quirks
All Quirks
This Sim's fame will be reset and they will no longer gain fame. Default fame settings for all Sims can be set in the Game Options.
Quit the Spotlight
Sims with Fame Perks can't quit the spotlight. To remove Fame Perks from a Sim, use the phone or computer to Book a Celebrity Cleanse.
Stay Out of the Spotlight?
WARNING: This action will reset any fame gained by this Sim to zero. If the Sim steps back into the spotlight later, they will restart from there.\n\nOnce out of the spotlight, the Sim will not gain any fame or become a celebrity. This button will then allow them to reverse this decision at any time.
This Sim will be able to gain fame and become a celebrity. Default fame settings for all Sims can be set in the Game Options.

Configure Neighborhood Stories

Enable Neighborhood Stories
All Households in &quot;Other Households&quot;
All Households in &quot;My Households&quot;
Play with Neighborhood Stories!
Neighborhood Stories enables households you don’t actively play to experience life changes. This includes pregnancy and adoption, moving in and out of houses, or maybe even untimely death due to accidents.\n\nGo to Manage Households to configure the system: separately enable/disable the feature for other households around town, choose which types of life changes are allowed, and even make custom settings for specific households.\n\nTo see the latest changes each day, go to a Mailbox and “Check Recent Neighborhood Stories”.\n\nVisit your neighbors to see how their lives change and develop over time! Check out the Neighborhood Stories Lesson to learn more.

When you’re not bundled up indoors, have some fun in the snow or on the ice. Don’t forget to decorate for Winterfest and plan your New Year’s resolutions!

Temperatures are climbing, so beat the heat with water balloons and sprinklers. Watch out for the thunderstorms, they can be electrifying!
Summer

Share your creations with the Community
Logging into The Sims 4 Gallery allows you to view creations made by other players, post comments, get updates from creators you are following, and select items from the Gallery to later download into your The Sims 4 game.\n\nOther players, including your friends, can follow you in the Gallery and view your Gallery profile. You can also see who is following you. If you do not want anyone to follow you or view your Gallery profile, simply change your EA Account privacy settings so that “No One” can see your profile. With this setting, other players will still be able to view and comment on content you have uploaded to the Gallery.\n\nBy using, you certify compliance with &lt;span class=&quot;tosLink&quot;&gt;&lt;a href='event:clickEvent'&gt;EA's User Agreement&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;.

From those of us at Maxis, a heartfelt thank you to all of the Sims players who participated in the creation of this Stuff Pack. This cooperative partnership was inspired by your feedback, and The Sims™ 4 Laundry Day Stuff came to fruition because of players like you. \n\nWe hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed sharing the development process with you.
The Sims™ 4 Laundry Day Stuff Pack © 2017 Electronic Arts Inc.

Crawdad Quarter
Crawdad Quarter is the heart of Willow Creek. All of the towns liveliness, from parks to nightlife, can be found in this neighborhood.
Located in southern Willow Creek, Foundry Cove has lots of character (and its share of characters). Residents enjoy modest homes with a canal nearby for fishing and a charming, active railroad.
Courtyard Lane offers affordable homes for the upwardly mobile set. Classic styling mingles with larger shotguns and more expansive homes.
Willow Creek's most desirable area, Sage Estates features large, sprawling estates, lush landscaping, and the best high society has to offer.
This historical section of Willow Creek, the Garden Community boasts large mansions and the cache that comes with living in them.

Mirage Canyon
Mirage Canyon is Oasis Spring’s true oasis. Parched visitors passing through can always delight in seeing the gorgeous rushing waterfall and a well-appreciated pitstop.
This upscale gated community offers its residents all the warm, wild benefits of living in the desert along with the luxury of endless green grass.
This neighborhood is your quintessential desert-living experience with bustling tumbleweeds and cacti as far as the eye can see!

The Brickery
There is a dampness in the air here that just doesn't feel right. Keep puddles mopped, trash from overflowing, and plumbing objects clean or mold piles will start to appear, and beware of the &lt;i&gt;deadly&lt;/i&gt; black mold pile!\n\nAvailable with For Rent.
Landfill Lot
This place is a dump! Trash accumulates on this lot.\n\nAvailable with Eco Lifestyle.
Island Spirits
Ancient Island spirits inhabit this lot, visiting frequently. How will Sims choose to interact with them?
Wild Foxes
Wild foxes will appear on this lot, being a nuisance to your garden, chickens, and rabbits.\n\nAvailable with Cottage Living.
Fairy Passage
This lot is near an enchanted passage. Fairy Sims are more likely to visit.
Spooky
For some inexplicable reason this lot attracts wandering Ghosts!\n\nAvailable with City Living.
Gremlins
Stuff breaks here a lot. It's like there are tiny goblins who come out at night and smash things... but that's ridiculous, right?\n\nAvailable with City Living.
Gnomes
Broken things just seem to get mended overnight. It's as if kindly Gnomes watch over the place...
Eco Lot
This lot moves toward eco-friendliness faster than others. 
Creepy Crawlies
It seems that some creepy pests have taken up residence here. Be prepared; when they hit, you'll never see them coming!
Clothing Optional
This lot embraces an open, natural lifestyle empowering visitors to shed strict material conventions and prudish societal moors… also their clothes.
Up-and-Coming Hotspot
At least your sims can say they ‘went here before it was cool.’ Also, cheap drinks and eats for the super famous! Even better, Meet a Celebrity events can only happen on Lounges with this trait.
Hottest Spot in Town
A place for the Superstars, the VIPs, those who’ve achieved victory over the commonplace! After all, who else could afford these hyperinflated lot prices? Not you... no. But at least, the Starlight Accolades can only happen on Lounges with this trait.
Heist Havoc
Lock the doors and hide all valuables! Burglars visit more often on this lot, and the trusty alarms have a mind of their own.
Volcanic Activity
This lot is near an active volcano! Beware of earthquakes, steam vents, and occasional lava bombs.\n\nAvailable with Island Living.
Singles Hangout
Looking to mingle with some singles?\n\nThis Lot Trait will have more date-ready Sims walking around in the neighborhood!
Simple Living
This lot requires ingredients to cook all recipes. Cooking with ingredients just makes food taste better!\n\nAvailable with Cottage Living.
Scare Seeker
There's something in the air here that fills you with eldritch excitement, and attracts Sims looking for a ghoulishly good time.
Training Ground
Sims gain Pet Training skill faster on this lot.
Dog Hangout
Stray dogs will hang out at this lot.
Dog Friendly
Dog owners will visit this lot and bring their dogs.
Cat Hangout
Stray cats really love this lot. Meow!
Cat Friendly
Cat owners will visit this lot with their cats.
Breeding Ground
Increases the chances for pets to have larger pet litters.
Natural Well
Spring water runs under this lot, reducing utility bills and offering fresh, clean water from the tap.
Geothermal
Natural heating lowers utility bills by generating power, and keeps any pools warm.
Regal Residence
The dream of a rich life becomes reality! Sims needs will decay slower, and their moods improve longer as the value of their lots goes up!
Celebrity Home
This residence is listed on the Celebrity Home Tours, granting increased fame gain, restricted access, and awe amongst welcomed visitors. Beware though! Those who live here but aren’t actually very famous will be considered posers! 
Romance Changes
Sims may start romance and either nurture or damage their relationship.
Retire from Career
Older Sims that are employed may retire from their career.
Leave a Career
Sims that are employed may leave their career.
Move Out
Households in Residential worlds may vacate lots.
Move In
Households may move into unoccupied lots of any Residential world.
Join a Career
Sims that are unemployed may seek out a career.
Have a Baby
Sim parents may bring new Sims into their family via childbirth.
Friendship Changes
Sims may make friends and either nurture or damage their friendship.
Adopt a Child
Sim parents may bring new Sims into their family via adoption.
Die in Accidents
Sims may die before their time. Does &lt;b&gt;not&lt;/b&gt; affect Old Age death.
